Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Halberd (+8 1d10+3 P/S; strength; expert); Longsword (+8 1d8+3 S/P; strength; expert); Starknife (+8 1d4+3 P/S [Crit +d6] R20'; strength; expert)

Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of any remaining damage
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts flat-footed for 1 rd
